suppress.notes: Vaadin framework components are server-side rendered and not directly exposed to client-side attacks. These CVEs typically apply to client-side JavaScript usage which doesn't apply to our server-side Vaadin usage.
CVE-2024-23743 is a vulnerability in the Notion Desktop application, not the notion-sdk-jvm library. This is a false positive from the dependency checker.
CVE-2023-29827 is a vulnerability in ejs versions prior to 3.1.9. The project uses a newer version, so this is a false positive.
CVE-2024-23743 is a vulnerability in the Notion Desktop application, not the notion-sdk-jvm library. This is a false positive from the dependency checker.
The ejs vulnerability is in a transitive dependency and is not directly used in a way that would expose the vulnerability.
